SEARCH
Module io.jstach.kiwi.kvs
Package io.jstach.kiwi.kvs

Interface KeyValuesSystem

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable
public sealed interface KeyValuesSystem extends AutoCloseable
The main entry point into the Kiwi configuration library. This interface provides access to core components for loading and processing key-value resources.

KeyValuesSystem allows the creation and configuration of loaders that can retrieve key-value pairs from various resources such as files, classpath locations, and system properties.

Example usage: 

var kvs = KeyValuesSystem.defaults()
	.loader()
	.add("classpath:/start.properties")
	.add("system:///")
	.add("env:///")
	.add("cmd:///-D")
	.load();
See Also:
  • KeyValuesResource
  • KeyValuesLoader
  • KeyValuesEnvironment
  • KeyValuesServiceProvider

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static final class 
    KeyValuesSystem.Builder
    A builder class for constructing instances of KeyValuesSystem with customizable components such as environment, loaders, and media finders.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static KeyValuesSystem.Builder
    builder()
    Creates and returns a new KeyValuesSystem.Builder for constructing customized KeyValuesSystem instances.
    default void
    close()
    This signals to the logger that this key value system will not be used anymore but there is guarantee of this.
    static KeyValuesSystem
    defaults()
    Returns a default implementation of KeyValuesSystem configured with standard settings and a ServiceLoader based on KeyValuesServiceProvider and its classloader.
    KeyValuesEnvironment
    environment()
    Returns the KeyValuesEnvironment instance used for system-level interactions.
    KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesFilter
    filter()
    Returns a composite KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesFilter that aggregates all the filters added to the KeyValuesSystem.Builder or found via the ServiceLoader, if configured.
    default KeyValuesLoader.Builder
    loader()
    Creates and returns a KeyValuesLoader.Builder for constructing loaders that can load key-value pairs from various resources.
    KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesLoaderFinder
    loaderFinder()
    Returns a composite KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesLoaderFinder that aggregates all loader finders added to the KeyValuesSystem.Builder or found via the ServiceLoader, if configured.
    KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder
    mediaFinder()
    Returns a composite KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder that aggregates all media finders added to the KeyValuesSystem.Builder or found via the ServiceLoader, if configured.

  • Method Details

    • environment

      KeyValuesEnvironment environment()
      Returns the KeyValuesEnvironment instance used for system-level interactions.
      Returns:
      the environment instance

    • loaderFinder

      KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesLoaderFinder loaderFinder()
      Returns a composite KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesLoaderFinder that aggregates all loader finders added to the KeyValuesSystem.Builder or found via the ServiceLoader, if configured. This composite allows finding loaders that can handle specific resources by delegating the search to all registered loader finders.
      Returns:
      the composite loader finder instance

    • mediaFinder

      KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder mediaFinder()
      Returns a composite KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder that aggregates all media finders added to the KeyValuesSystem.Builder or found via the ServiceLoader, if configured. This composite allows finding media handlers that can handle specific resources by delegating the search to all registered media finders.
      Returns:
      the composite media finder instance

    • filter

      KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesFilter filter()
      Returns a composite KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesFilter that aggregates all the filters added to the KeyValuesSystem.Builder or found via the ServiceLoader, if configured. This composite allows finding media handlers that can handle specific resources byrs.
      Returns:
      the composite filter

    • loader

      default KeyValuesLoader.Builder loader()
      Creates and returns a KeyValuesLoader.Builder for constructing loaders that can load key-value pairs from various resources.
      Returns:
      a new KeyValuesLoader.Builder instance

    • close

      default void close()
      This signals to the logger that this key value system will not be used anymore but there is guarantee of this.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable

    • defaults

      static KeyValuesSystem defaults()
      Returns a default implementation of KeyValuesSystem configured with standard settings and a ServiceLoader based on KeyValuesServiceProvider and its classloader.
      Returns:
      the default KeyValuesSystem instance
